contest-event.event-date:
Oct. 6, 2007 D West Wales BBA Contest (Second Section)
West Wales BBA Festival Contest (Second Section) 20 Own Choice Test Piece Contest West Wales BBA Festival Contest west-wales-bba-festival-contest-second-section
None
Burry Port, Carmarthenshire, Wales, UK Best instrumentalist - solo cornet - Ogmore. Prizes - 1st £200, 2nd £120, 3rd £80. 5 bands competed.
April 23, 2011, 3:04 p.m. July 4, 2020, 8:57 a.m.
1 Gwaun-cae-Gurwen Band Glyn Davies Roman Triptych
2 Blaenavon Town Band Gareth Ritter Variations on Laudate Dominum
3 Ynyshir Band Graham Sheppard
4 Ogmore Valley Silver Band Ivor Barnett
5 Penclawdd Brass Tony Small
Withdrawn Llwydcoed Band Alan Davies
